short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WordWise enhances web reading for dyslexics by transforming words. Contribute on GitHub: https://github.com/HairyDuck/WordWise

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WordWise is a powerful tool designed to enhance the web reading experience for individuals with dyslexia. It transforms and emphasizes words on web pages, making them easier to read and comprehend. This open-source project encourages contributions to improve and expand its features. Learn more and contribute at https://github.com/HairyDuck/WordWise.
